Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Votes.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Title: Directs the department of taxation and finance to provide notice to a property owner who is a veteran or a veteran's spouse when a school district grants a school tax exemption or abatement for veterans
Summary: Directs the department of taxation and finance to provide notice to a property owner who is a veteran or who is the spouse or unmarried surviving spouse of a veteran when a school district grants a school tax exemption or abatement for veterans and provide direction on how to apply for such exemption or abatement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to directing the department of taxation and finance to provide notice to a property owner who is a veteran or who is the spouse or unremarried surviving spouse of a veteran when the school district, in which their property is situate, elects to provide a real property exemption or abatement to veterans
